APP.TITLE: Guess a City
APP.SUBTITLE: Identify Danish cities using only roads and water
APP.FOOTER: Built with Angular & MapLibre GL | Data: OpenStreetMap & Statistics Denmark

START.DESCRIPTION: Test your knowledge of Danish cities by identifying them from their road networks and waterways.
START.STEP1: Choose your difficulty and number of cities
START.STEP2: Study the map showing only roads and water
START.STEP3: Guess which Danish city it is
START.STEP4: Build up your streak for a high score!

SETTINGS.TITLE: Game Settings
SETTINGS.CITIES_COUNT_EXPLANATION: Select how many of the largest cities to include. Lower values include fewer (but larger) cities. Higher values include more cities.
SETTINGS.DIFFICULTY_EXPLANATION: Difficulty controls how much of the map is visible. Easier modes show more roads, while harder modes show less detail.

CONTROLS.CITIES_COUNT_DESCRIPTION: Select how many of the largest cities to include.

RESULTS.NEW_HIGH_SCORE_MESSAGE: You achieved a streak of {{score}} cities!
